Description: The Toilets++ Optima is a dual-flush two-piece elongated toilet that combines modern design with water-saving features. With its powerful flush system, this toilet can save up to 20% of water usage compared to standard toilets. The Optima features a comfortable elongated bowl design and is made of high-quality ceramic material that resists staining and scratching.

The Toilets++ Harmony is a one-piece compact elongated toilet that offers a sleek and modern look for any bathroom. It features a Comfort Height bowl for ease of use and its compact design is perfect for small spaces. The Harmony has a powerful flush system that uses just 1.28 gallons of water per flush and is made of high-quality ceramic material that resists staining and scratching.
